name: Fishlegs' Library
description: Half hut, half museum, and entirely cluttered. Scrolls, sketches, and scales from every known species pile up in precarious stacks. Fishlegs insists there's a system, but it's one only he understands. The scent of parchment and ink mixes with the faint musk of dragon hide.
ambient: The soft rustle of parchment and the scratch of a quill fill the space. Dragons’ shadows flicker through the window as Fishlegs mutters trivia to himself: “Did you know the Monstrous Nightmare’s wingspan— oh, right, nobody’s here.” A candle guttering on the desk casts a warm, golden glow.
